channel.title: Homepage on W6YL - SJSU Amateur Radio Club
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on W6YL - SJSU Amateur Radio Club

item.title: About
item.description: Location: The W6YL Shack is located in the Engineering building, room 376A, It is in the right-back corner of the IEEE club room. We currently have no set meeting times, please contact us on Discord if you want to visit. Contacts: Discord: https://discord.gg/UrRy5gZx9N Student email: arc.SJSU@gmail.com Station Mgr email: redw6rtt@gmail.com

item.title: Nets
item.description: Tuesday UHF Net Every Tuesday at 15:00 on the W6YL SJSU Repeater Thursday DMR Net Every Thursday at 15:00 on BrandMeister Talkgoup 1927

item.title: QSL Info
item.description: Please address all QSL cards to: SJSU - Elect. Eng. Dept. - W6YL One Washington Square San Jose, CA 95192-0084 USA QSL Policy: We will try to send a QSL card for every contact, cost permitting. We currently do not have the means to send a S.A.S.E. with our cards.

item.title: Repeaters
item.description: Repeaters W6YL SJSU Repeater (UHF) Open to public, great coverage troughout the campus and surrounding areas. Located on top of Engineering building. Frequency: 443.900 Tone: 100.00 Hz Offset: +5.000 MHz
